name: Onikiri
description:
Onikiri is an action game. You have the power to rewind time.

You found the forgotten Katana - Onikiri (鬼切,  The Demon Slasher). The owner of this cursed blade will acquire the power of seeing through time and space. However, with great power comes great responsibility. The blade holder will possess the mission of eliminating awakened evil beings.

Now, the blade has chosen you to be the next emissary. Pick up the blade and slay the accursed fate...

Control:
